BoolProperty.Name: MSVCErrorReport
BoolProperty.Description: Report errors which Visual Studio can use to parse for file and line information.

StringProperty.Name: OutputFile
StringProperty.Description: The option overrides the default name and location of the program that the linker creates. (-o)

StringProperty.Name: Soname
StringProperty.Description: This option overrides the default soname of the shared library that the linker creates.

BoolProperty.Name: Version
BoolProperty.Description: The -version option tells the linker to put a version number in the header of the executable.

BoolProperty.Name: VerboseOutput
BoolProperty.Description: The -verbose option tells the linker to output verbose messages for debugging.

BoolProperty.Name: IncrementalLink
BoolProperty.Description: The option tells the linker to enable incremental linking.

StringListProperty.Name: SharedLibrarySearchPath
StringListProperty.Description: Allows the user to populate the shared library search path.

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalLibraryDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Allows the user to override the environmental library path. (-L folder).

BoolProperty.Name: UnresolvedSymbolReferences
BoolProperty.Description: This option when enabled will report unresolved symbol references.

BoolProperty.Name: OptimizeforMemory
BoolProperty.Description: Optimize for memory usage, by rereading the symbol tables as necessary.

StringProperty.Name: GccToolChain
StringProperty.Description: Folder path to Gcc Tool Chain.

StringProperty.Name: Sysroot
StringProperty.Description: Folder path to the root directory for headers and libraries.

StringListProperty.Name: IgnoreSpecificDefaultLibraries
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more names of default libraries to ignore.

StringListProperty.Name: ForceSymbolReferences
StringListProperty.Description: Force symbol to be entered in the output file as an undefined symbol.

EnumProperty.Name: DebuggerSymbolInformation
EnumProperty.Description: Debugger symbol information from the output file.

EnumValue.Name: OmitUnneededSymbolInformation
EnumValue.DisplayName: Omit Unneeded Symbols for Relocation Processing

BoolProperty.Name: PackageDebugSymbols
BoolProperty.Description: Strip the Debugger Symbols Information before Packaging. A copy of the original binary will be used for debugging.

StringProperty.Name: GenerateMapFile
StringProperty.Description: The Map option tells the linker to create a map file with the user specified name.

BoolProperty.Name: Relocation
BoolProperty.Description: This option marks variables read-only after relocation.

BoolProperty.Name: FunctionBinding
BoolProperty.Description: This option marks object for immediate function binding.

BoolProperty.Name: NoExecStackRequired
BoolProperty.Description: This option marks output as not requiring executable stack.

BoolProperty.Name: WholeArchiveBegin
BoolProperty.Description: Whole Archive uses all code from Sources and Additional Dependencies.

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalDependencies
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies additional items to add to the link command line.

StringListProperty.Name: LibraryDependencies
StringListProperty.Description: This option allows specifying additional libraries to be added to the linker command line. The additional libraries will be added to the end of the linker command line start with 'lib' and end with '.a' or '.so' extension. (-lFILE)
